ne24:2.2: “Tasmā rakkhitacittassa, sammāsaṅkappagocaro”ti idaṁ satindriyaṁ, satindriye gahite gahitāni bhavanti pañcindriyāni.
ne24:2.3: “Sammādiṭṭhipurekkhāro”ti sammādiṭṭhiyā gahitāya gahito bhavati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
ne24:2.5_0: Sammādiṭṭhito hi sammāsaṅkappo pabhavati, sammāsaṅkappato sammāvācā pabhavati, sammāvācāto
ne24:2.5_1: sammākammanto pabhavati, sammākammantato sammāājīvo pabhavati, sammāājīvato sammāvāyāmo
ne24:2.5_2: pabhavati, sammāvāyāmato sammāsati pabhavati, sammāsatito sammāsamādhi pabhavati,
ne24:2.5_3: sammāsamādhito sammāvimutti pabhavati, sammāvimuttito sammāvimuttiñāṇadassanaṁ pabhavati.
